short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows for quick searching of goodread books on an arbitrary website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays search links besides each book on goodreads. The links point to a search on an arbitrary, configurable site. Example sites could be amazon.com, google.com or worldcat.org.
